title: My channel trailer on youtube

replies.body: Why do you open the menu everytime you switch clip?
replies.body_tagged: Why do you open the menu everytime you switch clip?

replies.body: He probably doesn't have a hotkey to stop recording so he has to click it.
replies.body_tagged: He probably doesn't have a hotkey to stop recording so he has to click it.

reply_to.body: Why do you open the menu everytime you switch clip?
reply_to.body_tagged: Why do you open the menu everytime you switch clip?

reply_to.body: He probably doesn't have a hotkey to stop recording so he has to click it.
reply_to.body_tagged: He probably doesn't have a hotkey to stop recording so he has to click it.

replies.body: Bandicam has a hotkey, I would recommend using it. Also, don't show the part in the video where you pull up the recording thing. Just cut those parts out, otherwise it looks like no work / effort was put into it.
replies.body_tagged: Bandicam has a hotkey, I would recommend using it. Also, don't show the part in the video where you pull up the recording thing. Just cut those parts out, otherwise it looks like no work / effort was put into it.

replies.body:
Another thing. If you put a song in, don't put the Minecraft sounds over it. It doesn't sound good that way.
Also, when you end the video, I would make the end of the song fade off so it doesn't just suddenly end in the middle of the song
replies.body_tagged:
Another thing. If you put a song in, don't put the Minecraft sounds over it. It doesn't sound good that way.
Also, when you end the video, I would make the end of the song fade off so it doesn't just suddenly end in the middle of the song

replies.body: Do not bump threads with a comment that  has no relation to the topic of the thread, please. Thanks.
